snippet.title: TILT - Steam Announcement Trailer (NEW Puzzle Gravity Portal-Like Game)
snippet.description:
WISHLIST IT NOW ON STEAM ►► Tinyurl.com/mr2s3zm6 

In Tilt, forget everything you know about gravity, as you use your A.E.R.O.G.R.I.P. to walk on walls, put cubes on the ceiling, and manipulate your gravity at will.

After being selected to take part in Ascendium Tech's newest training course, you will have to solve the increasingly mind-bending puzzles that are thrown at you. But don't worry, you will be guided by the Aerostation Overseer who will try his best to direct you throughout the course. Make sure to cooperate with his instructions, or you may find yourself breaking something you shouldn't. Stick to the course, and nothing should go wrong!

Release Date: COMING SOON! Be sure to WISHLIST to stay updated.

WISHLIST IT NOW ON STEAM ►► Tinyurl.com/mr2s3zm6 

Thanks so much for your support, really appreciate it!

• Website: MascotBro.com
• YouTube: @mascotbro  
• Twitter: Twitter.com/MascotBroStudio
• IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/tilt-portal-like-game
• Discord: Discord.com/invite/MsaaK93hWw

Game created by @StopShutGames and published by Mascot Bro Studio

The awesome Voice Actor: @Jace_Va

@Hashtags-gaming  #horrorgamestamillive #horrorgames2023 #horrorgaming #horrorstories #scary #youtubechannel #gaming #dynamogaming gaming #mascot #mascothorror #kindergarten
